detail_desc: Leggings in soft jersey with an elasticated waist and cut-out rips down the legs.
Cardigan in washed-look sweatshirt fabric with raw edges, a hood and patch front pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and no buttons.
Trainers with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Sandals in imitation suede with lacing at the front, an ankle-height shaft and covered heels. Imitation leather linings and insoles. Heel 8 cm.
Linen-blend jacket in a herringbone weave with notch lapels, a covered button at the front, welt front pockets with a flap, and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Cold shoulder top in soft jersey with short sleeves that have a decorative tie detail.
Blouse in a cotton weave with a deep V-neck front and back with a horizontal, contrasting colour grosgrain strap at the back. Gently dropped shoulders, short, flounced sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with a frill-trimmed yoke in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Wide, 5-pocket jeans in slightly stretchy cotton denim. Tight fit at the top with a regular waist, zip fly and button and straight legs.

Jumpsuit in a soft, patterned viscose weave with short dolman sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a decorative bow. Concealed press-at the back, an elasticated seam and decorative bow with tassels at the waist, side pockets and wide, ankle-length legs.
Short-sleeved shirt in washed linen with a resort collar, French front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Straight fit with a gently rounded hem.
Short, straight-style dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Jumper in double-layered, fine knit cotton with a button on one shoulder, long sleeves, a roll-edge neckline and narrow ribbing around the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in sturdy jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Shorts in an airy viscose weave with lace trims at the sides and hems. Wide, covered elastic waistband with a decorative bow with tassels.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck and long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in jersey with a soft, brushed finish. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs.

Soft, non-wired bra in lace with lined cups and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps that double at the back. Wide elastication at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Long-sleeved tops in soft cotton jersey with buttons at the top, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. One of the tops has an open chest pocket.
Bootees in soft fabric with embroidery and appliqués at the front. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Short, fitted cardigan in a fine knit with a V-neck, buttons down the front and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist and medium coverage at the back.
Long cardigan in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the back of the neck, cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Checked cotton flannel shirt with a lined, drawstring hood in sweatshirt fabric, a narrow collar and two flap chest pockets with a button. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a straight-cut hem.
Cardigan in a soft bouclé knit made from a wool blend with a hood and no buttons.
Fine-knit sports socks in a soft cotton blend with a ribbed shaft.
Crop top in jersey with a low neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps.
Straight-cut, knee-length dress in patterned mesh with a round neckline, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves. Fitted inner dress in jersey with a sheen.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Shorts in woven fabric. High paper bag waist with covered elastication.
Briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated waist and elasticated hems. Soft brushed inside.
Shorts in soft, Tencel™ lyocell denim with a high waist that is elasticated at the back and has a tie detail at the front. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and short, wide legs.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a loop at the back. Satin linings and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Soft faux fur make-up bag with a zip at the top. Lined. Size 5x10x15 cm.
Trousers in stretch cotton twill with a high waist, zip fly and button, side and back pockets, and straight legs.
5-pocket shorts in washed, stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Waterproof hi-top trainers in imitation leather and mesh with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front. Mesh linings and insoles. The trainers have a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Wide, straight-cut jacket in a viscose weave with a sheen. Notch lapels, a concealed fastening at the front, front pockets, dropped shoulders and 3/4-length sleeves.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps, one with a flounce trim, a V-neck with a discreet button at the top and a wrapover front. Elastication and a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
5-pocket trousers in stretch, supersoft twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight hems.
Tunic in a cotton weave with a collar, button placket, yoke at the back and buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt and a rounded hem.
Patterned swim shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft fabric. Top with a motif on the front, press-studs on one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.

Sports trousers in fabric with a slight sheen. Elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and an open back pocket. Tapered legs with sewn-in creases at the front and contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Wide jumper in a soft, rib-knit cotton blend with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Pull-on trousers in an airy weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button and tapered legs.

Short, A-line dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck. Short puff sleeves with narrow elastication at the hems, and gathered seams at the waist and hem creating tiers for added width. Sleeveless jersey underdress.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with terry inside.

Sports bag in woven fabric with two wide handles at the top. Drawstring at the top and two shoulder straps which mean the bag can be carried as a backpack. Large outer compartment with a press-stud and a small inner compartment. Double-layered. Width 39 cm. Height 45 cm.

Calf-length, straight-cut dress in a cotton and linen blend with a collar, buttons down the front, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Detachable tie belt at the waist and short slits in the sides.
Top in soft jersey with a glittery print motif on the front, short sleeves and narrow ribbing around the neckline.
Shorts in stretch twill with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey, two ribbed and one with an all-over print. Concealed press-stud on one shoulder and press-studs at the crotch.
High-waisted jeans in washed superstretch denim with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Wide Alice band covered in glossy jersey with studs. Embroidered trim on the inside.

Block-coloured nylon windbreaker with a high stand-up collar, zip down the front and concealed front pockets with a press-stud. Wide dolman sleeves with elastication at the cuffs, and an elasticated hem. Lined.
Shorts in hard-washed sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a concealed zip.
Crop tops in cotton jersey with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with decorative seams. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck T-shirt in soft viscose jersey.
Fitted, knee-length lace skirt with concealed elastication at the waist and a scalloped hem. Lined.
Cropped, off-the-shoulder top in jersey crêpe. Smocked bodice with overlocked edges top and bottom, and long sleeves with narrow, covered elastication at the cuffs.
Short dungaree dress in imitation suede with adjustable straps and a zip at the front. Lined at the top.
Slim-fit, ankle-length jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Trousers in a slightly stretchy weave made from a wool blend with an elasticated waist and fake fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets, and gently tapered legs with sewn-in creases down the front.

Blouse in a fine cotton weave with a small stand-up collar and visible buttons at the top. Smocking with gathers at the shoulders, long sleeves with small, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Tights in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Coat in a wool blend with notch lapels, a tie belt at the waist, pockets in the side seams and no buttons. Unlined.
Romper suit in an organic cotton weave with narrow shoulder straps with buttons and decorative bows. Frills at the top, concealed press-studs at the crotch and short legs with elasticated hems.
Jersey-lined cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an adjustable, elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud. Front pockets, a fake back pocket with a flap and flap leg pockets.
Light jacket in a cotton weave with a collar and short lapels. Buttons down the front, flap side pockets with a button and a tab with a button at the cuffs. Unlined.
Skater skirt in a soft, fine knit with an elasticated waist.
Short-sleeved dress in printed cotton jersey with a seam at the hips and a flounced skirt.
Long skirt in soft, heavily draping Tencel™ lyocell jersey. High waist with covered elastication. Lined.
Waist bag with a zip at the top and an adjustable strap with a plastic fastener. Lined. Size 5x12x24 cm.
Long dress in mesh with a round neckline, long sleeves and concealed elastication down the front and sleeves for a draped look. Lined.

Calf-length skirt in a stretch weave with a sewn-in wrapover and wide flounces at the front. Concealed zip at the back, a tie at the side and seam with a flounce at the front and hem. Overlocked edges. Unlined.
